home.about: A frontend developer passionate about creating interactive and responsive web applications. I enjoy exploring new technologies and tools to build modern and user-centric projects.

simplify.name: Simplify
simplify.description: Simplify is a sleek and easy-to-use to-do list app that helps you stay organised and productive. You can quickly create, edit and delete lists or tasks, use colours to personalise your dashboard and set the start date and time for tasks to stay on track. Designed to work seamlessly on any device, Simplify keeps your tasks secure and always within reach. Celebrate your progress with confetti when you complete a task, making productivity feel rewarding and fun!
simplify.keyFeatures: Task Management, Colour-Coding, Smart Scheduling, Confetti Celebration, Secure Authentication, Responsive Design

weatherOrNot.name: Weather or Not
weatherOrNot.description: Weather or Not is a weather app that provides real-time weather updates for any city. You can quickly search for a city and view current weather conditions, including temperature, humidity and forecasts for the day or week ahead. The app offers a dynamic background that changes based on the time of day and lets you switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit, along with other units of measurement for wind speed, pressure and more. With a fully responsive design, you can easily access weather information on any device, keeping you prepared no matter where you are.
weatherOrNot.keyFeatures: Real-Time Weather Info, Hourly & Weekly Forecasts, City Search, Dynamic Background, Temperature Unit Toggle, Fully Responsive
